sponsor: Sidney Kimmel Cancer Center at Thomas Jefferson University
briefTitle: Comparing Two Forms of Head Immobilization for Stereotactic Radiotherapy
officialTitle: A Randomized Trial Comparing Two Forms of Immobilization of the Head for Fractioned Stereotactic Radiotherapy
summary: Fractionated stereotactic radiotherapy (SRT) requires extremely precise and reproducible immobilization of the patient's head. This randomized study compares the efficacy of two commonly used forms of immobilization used for SRT.

primaryOutcome.measure: Distance From Ideal to Center of GTC Frame and BrainLab Thermoplastic Mask With Respect to Average and Variability
